parameters.name: AccessType
parameters.description:
The mode in which the domain name is added to WAF. Valid values:

*   **share:** CNAME record mode. This is the default value.
*   **hybrid_cloud_cname:** hybrid cloud reverse proxy mode.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to delete.

parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The ID of the domain name.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to obtain the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region where the WAF instance resides. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou:** the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1:** outside the Chinese mainland.
